attributes.action: Scrap the idea of extra teachers out of hours for Literacy & Mathematics (too expensive) & bring back more Teaching Assistants (who are trained for extra tuition, the standard fell when many TA's were made redundant)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A lot of TA's were made redundant in 2003 after requesting a pay rise. They're trained to give extra tuition in Literacy & Mathematics and other area's (hence the pay rise request).
The standard has fallen since this was done & it is now suggested that expensive teachers are used out of hours (how many children would do this after school?)
